headline: 2 Monster Stocks to Hold for the Next 10 Years
summary: Caterpillar and Okta benefit from the AI boom but have enough other revenue streams to balance out any boom-and-bust cycle.

headline: Trump’s America First Agenda Is Pushing Industrial ETFs like XLI To The Moon
summary: The industrial sector doesn’t make headlines like tech stocks do, but it’s the machinery behind infrastructure spending, defense budgets, and manufacturing cycles. When GDP growth accelerates or governments commit to multi-year infrastructure plans, industrial companies see order books expand. That’s the core thesis behind The Industrial Select Sector SPDR Fund (NYSEARCA:XLI), which offers pure exposure ... Trump’s America First Agenda Is Pushing Industrial ETFs like XLI To The Moon
